Feedback

We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve.
Bill Gates
I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better.
Elon Musk

Please give us feedback to help us improve

You can send feedback via a message to the fcc-norman chatroom on slack.

Also, you can send a direct message chris-tse and joematthews on slack.

Last, but not least, you can fill out this anonymous form to send feedback to the organizers.

Help us improve this page. Fork it on GitHub!
